sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { CButton, CCard, CCardBody, CCardFooter, CCardHeader, CCol, CForm, CFormGroup, CFormText, CTextarea, CInput, CLabel, CModal, CModalHeader, CModalBody, CModalFooter, CModalTitle, CValidFeedback } from '@coreui/react' import CIcon from '@coreui/icons-react' const CreateNode = () => { const [appName, setAppName] = useState(""); const [hostName, setHostName] = useState(""); const [owner, setOwner] = useState(""); const [group, setGroup] = useState(""); const [groupMail, setGroupMail] = useState(""); const [desciption, setDesciption] = useState(""); const createNodeReq = async (e) => { const payload = { appName: appName, hostName: hostName, owner: owner, group: group, groupMail: groupMail, desciption: desciption } }; return ( <> Create a new node createNodeReq(e)} className="form-horizontal"> Application Name setAppName(e.target.value)} // id="text-input" name="text-input" /> Looks good Host Name setHostName(e.target.value)} // id="email-input" name="email-input" /> {/* Enter host/server name */} App Owner setOwner(e.target.value)} // id="password-input" name="password-input" /> {/* Owner of this app (eg. group leader) */} Group Name setGroup(e.target.value)} // id="password-input" name="password-input" /> {/* Team developed and operated this app */} Group Email setGroupMail(e.target.value)} // id="email-input" name="email-input" autoComplete="email" /> {/* Contact email of the group */} Description setDesciption(e.target.value)} // name="textarea-input" // id="textarea-input" rows="3" />
Submit Reset
) } export default CreateNode
